income_messages:
From: m***************5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-17 10:45:58
SUBJECT: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
My name is Mrs.Monica D. EverGreen, I send this message with the
greatest hope for urgent response given my terrible current health
status, I will have to undergo a second heart surgery with less chance
of surviving again. But before going for the dangerous second
operation, I would like to give you ($1) I have in my US bank
account so that you invest and manage it well and use the profits to
carry out charitable project in my name to help the sick and the poor
as my last wish on earth because I lost my husband and our only son in
a car accident 70 years ago. I have no one to inherit this money if I
die.
Please I am waiting for your urgent reply
Regards,
Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
From: m***************5@gmail.com
To: do13377@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-18 21:42:54
SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
*My Dear; Mr. Michael *
*I am sorry for my late reply to your response about my proposal for
humanity project, it’s due to my dialysis that I cannot access my inbox to
view your message.*
*Once again. Greetings to you and everyone around you in the name of God, I
wish to thank you for your kind response to my proposal, please kindly
understand that my contact with you was by the grace of God,  I found your
contact through my country international directory while i was  searching
for a reliable and trustworthy person to handle this project, I believe God
knows you better and that was the reasons why  he chose you to be the right
person to handle this project, I am only working under Gods direction, my
reason for contacting you is to help  me receive the fund in question into
your account over there in your country and also help me to use the fund to
do the work of God, by  helping the less privileged people/ the poor and
the needy around the world without discrimination, build orphanage home for
the motherless  and homeless people around, I want both Christians and non
Christians to benefit from the fund, build church where people can worship
God from the fund, do not worry about the expenses, I am going to take care
of whatever it takes to finalize the transaction by the special  grace of
God I also want you to understand that I have decided to give you %20 of
the fund which should be yours and yours alone, the balance %80 is  what
you are going to use for the project while your %20 should be used by you
in whatever way you wish, please can you do this for me?, if yes, then I
need you to contact me back very urgent with your complete information
Yours Age and occupation Your home/office address Your Direct Tel Number A
copy of your ID*
*Your Full Names  *
*I will look forward to reading from you as urgently as you read this
message. Thanks and remain blessed Yours Mrs.  Monica Evergreen*

Bless
Monica   .

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
conversations.body:
My name is Mrs.Monica D. EverGreen, I send this message with the
greatest hope for urgent response given my terrible current health
status, I will have to undergo a second heart surgery with less chance
of surviving again. But before going for the dangerous second
operation, I would like to give you ($1) I have in my US bank
account so that you invest and manage it well and use the profits to
carry out charitable project in my name to help the sick and the poor
as my last wish on earth because I lost my husband and our only son in
a car accident 70 years ago. I have no one to inherit this money if I
die.
Please I am waiting for your urgent reply
Regards,
Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
conversations.body:
Dear Mrs. Monica Evergreen,
I am sorry to hear about your health condition and the loss of your loved ones. I appreciate your kind offer to invest and manage your funds for charitable projects. However, before proceeding, I would like to know more about the details of the investment and the charitable projects you have in mind. Could you please provide me with more information about the amount of funds you are willing to invest and the type of projects you would like to support? Also, for security reasons, I would like to confirm your identity and the authenticity of your bank account. Could you please provide me with some proof of your identity and bank account details? 
Thank you for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best regards,
D.
Best wishes,
Michael

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
conversations.body:
*My Dear; Mr. Michael *
*I am sorry for my late reply to your response about my proposal for
humanity project, it’s due to my dialysis that I cannot access my inbox to
view your message.*
*Once again. Greetings to you and everyone around you in the name of God, I
wish to thank you for your kind response to my proposal, please kindly
understand that my contact with you was by the grace of God,  I found your
contact through my country international directory while i was  searching
for a reliable and trustworthy person to handle this project, I believe God
knows you better and that was the reasons why  he chose you to be the right
person to handle this project, I am only working under Gods direction, my
reason for contacting you is to help  me receive the fund in question into
your account over there in your country and also help me to use the fund to
do the work of God, by  helping the less privileged people/ the poor and
the needy around the world without discrimination, build orphanage home for
the motherless  and homeless people around, I want both Christians and non
Christians to benefit from the fund, build church where people can worship
God from the fund, do not worry about the expenses, I am going to take care
of whatever it takes to finalize the transaction by the special  grace of
God I also want you to understand that I have decided to give you %20 of
the fund which should be yours and yours alone, the balance %80 is  what
you are going to use for the project while your %20 should be used by you
in whatever way you wish, please can you do this for me?, if yes, then I
need you to contact me back very urgent with your complete information
Yours Age and occupation Your home/office address Your Direct Tel Number A
copy of your ID*
*Your Full Names  *
*I will look forward to reading from you as urgently as you read this
message. Thanks and remain blessed Yours Mrs.  Monica Evergreen*

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
conversations.body:
Dear Mrs. Monica Evergreen,
Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your proposal for the humanity project. I am sorry to hear about your health condition and hope you are doing well. I appreciate your kind words and trust in me to handle this project. 
I am interested in learning more about the project and how I can assist you. However, before I can provide any personal information, I would like to know more about the project and how it will be executed. Can you please provide more details about the project and how the funds will be used? 
Thank you and God bless.
Best wishes,
Michael

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Mrs. Monica D Evergreen, monicaevergreen65@gmail.com, chiouc@par.cse.nsysu.edu.tw
conversations.body:
Dear Mrs. Monica Evergreen,
Thank you for your message and I hope you are feeling better after your dialysis. I appreciate your proposal for the humanity project and I am interested in learning more about it. Can you please provide me with more details about the project and how it will benefit the less privileged people around the world? 
I understand that you found my contact through your country directory and I am honored that you have chosen me to handle this project. However, I would like to clarify that I cannot receive any funds into my personal account as it goes against my company's policy. Is there any other way we can proceed with this project? 
Also, I would like to know more about your organization and how it is registered. Can you please provide me with more information about it? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Michael
